metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1999 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: There exists a use after free/double free in libwebp. An attacker can usethe ApplyFiltersAndEncode() function and loop through to free best.bw andassign best = trial pointer. The second loop will then return 0 because ofan Out of memory error in VP8 encoder, the pointer is still assigned totrial and the AddressSanitizer will attempt a double free.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libwebp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
